section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Administrative service provider contract" has the meaning stated in § 19-713.2 of this subtitle.
"Contracting provider" has the meaning stated in § 19-713.2 of this subtitle.
A person must register with the Commissioner before the person acts as a contracting provider in this State.
A health maintenance organization may not enter into an administrative service provider contract with a contracting provider that has not registered with the Commissioner.
An applicant for registration shall submit an application to the Commissioner in a form approved by the Commissioner and include any information required under subsection (e) of this section.
A registration under this section expires 2 years from the date the application is approved.

text.section: The Commissioner may charge a registration fee sufficient to cover the cost of implementing this section.
The Commissioner may adopt regulations to carry out the provisions of this section and § 19-713.2 of this subtitle.
